title: Integrate run monitoring into tick-board main view
description:
Wire up the new components into the main tick-board view.

Location: internal/tickboard/ui/src/components/tick-board.ts

Integration:
- Add 'Live Run' panel/drawer that appears when an epic has active runs
- Connect to SSE stream for selected epic
- Display run-output-pane when run is active
- Show tool-activity indicator in header or sidebar
- Display run-metrics during active run
- Broadcast run completion events to update tick cards

UI Layout:
- Consider split view: board on left, run output on right
- Or overlay/drawer approach
- Mobile: full-screen toggle between board and run view
closed_reason: Integrated run monitoring into tick-board main view. Added: (1) Run status polling to auto-detect active runs across epics, (2) SSE run stream connection for real-time updates, (3) Split-view layout with collapsible run panel alongside kanban board, (4) Wired run-output-pane, tool-activity, and run-metrics components into the panel, (5) 'r' keyboard shortcut to toggle run panel and Escape to close, (6) Live dot indicator when runs are active. Modified tick-board.ts and api/ticks.ts.
